title: On the corner of Chestnut and 3rd, in front of City of Wilmington building, is a sculpture on a pole of an animal.  What is the animal and why is it there, what is it\'s significance?
text:
That is part of the PedArt program by the city -- stands for
Pedestrian Art. Artists have many creations throughout downtown. The
animal has no real significance, except of course to the artist.
